no, that wouldn’t work because the void needs those ints to be there.

public void ProjectileSpell(int startID, int movingID, int finishID, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int index, int enemyY, int enemyX, int lvlReq)

item.title: Making Spells Cost No Runes
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > 93) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(565)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.Teleblock(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 35; attackPlayersWithin(369, 1, 1); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 4); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); }

Edit this part:

if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(565)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) {

You can delete it, change it or just make it say 0. playerHasItemAmount(ITEMID, AMOUNT). Hope I helped.

item.description:

if (magicID == 1152 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Wind Strike ProjectileSpell(90, 95, 92, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 2, 1, 566, 558, 1, 1); }
